            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E5%BC%BA%E5%AF%B9%E9%AB%98%E9%BE%84%E5%8F%8A%E6%9C%89%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%96%BE%E7%97%85%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%A2%84%E8%AD%A6%E7%9B%91%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#加强对高龄及有基础疾病患者预警监测#</a>】针对高龄及有基础疾病患者，金银潭医院院长张定宇提示，要加强预警监测，发现有不好苗头抓紧处理，没有达到重症标准也可按重症进行治疗。广州医科大学附属第一医院副院长张挪富表示，根据一些前期统计，ICU病人平均在65岁以上，希望早点进行干预措施治疗原发 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu3pWlCCb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471629805153327:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471629805153327&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3276722231" usercard="id=3276722231">儿科陈医生</a><a title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://kefu.weibo.com/faqdetail?id=20848"><span class="icon_icon"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans"></i></span></a>：新冠病毒感染后，人体的免疫系统会产生抗体，并存在血液中，通过与病毒的某些蛋白结合，并与免疫系统的其它功能配合，可以使病毒无法再感染人体的正常细胞，共同完成对病毒的清理。把健康人的血液抽出来，经抗凝、离心后拿掉血细胞，剩下的液体就是血浆，血浆中含有抗体，可以用来对其他病人进行治疗。        </div>

                                <a name="4471623661102227" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu3g24CJR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 21:47" date="1581601622000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471623661102227:fromprofile"> 2月13日 21:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【童朝晖：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%AF%94%E4%B8%8ESARS%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%97%85%E6%83%85%E8%BF%9B%E5%B1%95%E5%BF%AB%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎患者比与SARS患者病情进展快#</a>】北京朝阳医院副院长童朝晖表示：新冠肺炎患者出现的是严重的呼吸衰竭，与03年的SARS相比，病情进展得更快，缺氧发展得很明显；此外，这次患者心脏受到的攻击非常厉害，救治起来的难度比以前要大。因此，我们提出要密切观察这类患者的生命体征，比如心 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu3g24CJR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471623661102227:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471623661102227&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iu3aE9cj0&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331396&amp;ssig=cLAxfq%2BbHA" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471620322192258" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu3aE9cj0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 21:33" date="1581600826000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471620322192258:fromprofile"> 2月13日 21:33</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%B4%E5%BA%8A%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%AD%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%89%E5%88%A9%E4%BA%8E%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%94%B6%E6%B2%BB%23&amp;from=default">#增加临床诊断病例有利于疑似患者收治#</a>】北京朝阳医院副院长童朝晖：把临床诊断这个层次加进来以后，有利把很多我们过去认为是疑似的患者，按照临床诊断标准，纳入临床诊断。有利对临床诊断的患者进行管理。轻症患者可以进行隔离治疗，也更加有利于收治重症患者。能够让更多的过去认为是疑似患者，符 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu3aE9cj0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471620322192258:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471620322192258&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                            </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                    <!-- 删除 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中纪委常委会会议：重点加强对湖北及武汉纪检监察工作指导】中央纪委常委会13日召开会议，会议强调，纪检监察机关要坚决有力监督保障执行，继续紧盯疫情防控责任落实、重点工作和重点环节强化政治监督，督促各级党委、政府落实主体责任，督促卫生健康、交通、市场监管、药监等部门履行行业监管职责。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu35UnMTS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471617385669520:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471617385669520&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471612856405944" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu2YBqStG?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 21:04" date="1581599046000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471612856405944:fromprofile"> 2月13日 21:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E5%86%88%E7%AE%A1%E6%8E%A7%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E5%8D%87%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#黄冈管控措施全面升级#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E5%86%88%E5%B8%82%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%85%A8%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#黄冈市所有小区全封闭管理#</a>】为应对当前疫情发展严峻形势，控制人员流动和车辆通行，彻底阻断疫情传播，黄冈市疫情防控指挥部决定从即日起，在全市范围全面升级管控措施。现紧急通告：<br>　　一、所有小区（居民点）一律实行全封闭管理。除医护人员、抗疫工作人员和水电油气 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2YBqStG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471612856405944:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471612856405944&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4471624764204745&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2254698902&amp;commentmid=4471612856405944" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>11</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月13日 21:51</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471609928475986" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu2TSzyZs?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 20:52" date="1581598348000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471609928475986:fromprofile"> 2月13日 20:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%90%8E%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E6%96%AD%E5%8F%91%E5%87%BA%E5%BE%81%23&amp;from=default">#95后护士断发出征#</a>：妈妈鼓励我上“战场”】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，2月13日，在支援湖北的誓师大会上，感染科护士张晓岚下定决心，剪去了从小留到大的一头长发。长发落地的那一刻，她哭了。但她是一名共产党员，没有任何理由退缩。“上‘前线’不害怕，爸妈也支持我。我坚信，我们一定会战胜‘疫魔’ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2TSzyZs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471609928475986:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471609928475986&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E5%A4%A7%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF%E5%8C%96%E8%BA%ABTony%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E4%B8%BA%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E7%90%86%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#公安大队长化身Tony老师为队员理发#</a>】疫情期间，理发店都没有营业，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%9C%80%E5%B1%B1%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=蜀山公安">@蜀山公安</a> 处突队大队长张斌看着男队员们头发越来越长，便在参与疫情防控之余给大家理起发来。“之前在部队就会理发，去店里理发也会观察学习，没想到这时候派上用场了”。网友：带的了队伍，当的了Tony<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471607634800502:1034-video:1034%3A4471550003576834:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471607634800502:2286908003" title="蜀山公安的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hbvre3" alt="http://t.cn/A6hbvre3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>蜀山公安的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【家人确诊无人照顾，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%238%E4%BD%8D%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%E6%B8%A9%E6%83%85%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A45%E5%B2%81%E7%94%B7%E7%AB%A5%23&amp;from=default">#8位护士妈妈温情守护5岁男童#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月3日，5岁男童熙熙的家人先后被确诊为新冠肺炎，熙熙面临无人照顾的情况。8名护士自发组成“妈妈团”，轮流照顾他的生活起居。2月12日，熙熙的妈妈治愈出院。虽然这份陪伴是临时的，但背后的爱却是最真挚的！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%9F%B9%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=蟹视频">@蟹视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471601540467536:2017607-video:2017607%3Ae792c9f68fe70f4fdbd8160112f67807:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471601540467536:2286908003" title="蟹视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4WBut" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4WBut" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>蟹视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331396&amp;ssig=cLAxfq%2BbHA" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471598998360076" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu2Cfz4PW?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 20:09" date="1581595742000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471598998360076:fromprofile"> 2月13日 20:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#日本首例新冠肺炎死亡病例#</a>：为80多岁女性】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>日本厚生劳动省2月13日晚上称，一名家住神奈川县的80多岁的女性因感染新冠肺炎而死亡。这是日本国内出现的首例感染新冠肺炎死亡的病例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【《美国工厂》“男主角”曹德旺：影片批评了我，但我不担心有负面影响】2月10日，纪录片《美国工厂》获得了第92届奥斯卡金像奖最佳纪录长片奖。在不少网友看来，影片对福耀玻璃创始人曹德旺有不少批评。“男主角”曹德旺却说，“这部片子批评了我，但我不担心有负面影响。”在美国办厂是一次尝试，曹 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2zPbKmE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471597492799836:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471597492799836&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E8%AF%BE%E7%A8%8B%E4%B8%8D%E8%B6%8520%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#广东要求中小学线上课程不超20分钟#</a>】13日，广东省教育厅防控新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组印发《延迟开学期间中小学线上教学工作指引》，提出要合理安排学生学习时间，对小学低年级线上学习不作统一硬性要求，由家长和学生自愿选择；要统筹安排好其他学段各门学科的线上课程内容，线上课程时间一般不能 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2qwnhaX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471591725547571:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471591725547571&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中央：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%9D%E6%84%9F%E9%BB%84%E5%86%88%E7%AD%89%E5%9C%B0%E8%A6%81%E9%87%87%E5%8F%96%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%90%8C%E7%AD%89%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#孝感黄冈等地要采取武汉同等隔离救治措施#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>13日，中央应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组指出，要继续把湖北省特别是武汉市作为疫情防控的重中之重。武汉市要对“四类人员”加速分类集中收治或隔离；孝感、黄冈等地要采取和武汉同等的隔离救治措施。湖北和武汉要进一步强化离汉 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2nYB6lV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471590148842559:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471590148842559&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2nYB6lV&amp;mid=4471590148842559&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbv03sbf6rj20ck0ck3z3" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>39</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331405&amp;ssig=iyymYxCJjZ" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471587237318860" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu2jhuHY8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 19:22" date="1581592937000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471587237318860:fromprofile"> 2月13日 19:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E5%94%90%E5%83%A7%E4%B8%8A%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#微信唐僧上线#</a>，咱老百姓心安<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6d/2018new_zhongguozan_org.png" title="[中国赞]" alt="[中国赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，“家里缺啥直接在微信上说，我们替你跑腿…”疫情发生后，内蒙古通辽市的党员志愿者们组成了“战疫小组”，24小时轮流值班。“勤洗手、戴口罩”已成为了老党员布和特木勒的口头禅，给联系户打电话、发微信、询问身体状况…村民亲切地称呼 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2jhuHY8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471587237318860:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471587237318860&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471584037542380" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu2e7vE7i?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 19:09" date="1581592175000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471584037542380:fromprofile"> 2月13日 19:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人社部、财政部：有关单位<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%A5%E8%B5%84%E8%A6%81%E5%90%91%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%80%BE%E6%96%9C%23&amp;from=default">#工资要向疫情防控一线人员倾斜#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>13日，人社部、财政部印发通知，要求在疫情防控期间，向承担新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控任务重、风险程度高的医疗卫生机构核增一次性绩效工资总量，不作为绩效工资总量基数。有关单位在内部分配时，要向敢于担当、勇挑重担 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2e7vE7i" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471584037542380:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471584037542380&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【国务院扶贫开发领导小组：坚持如期全面完成脱贫攻坚任务不动摇】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%B3%E6%88%982020%23&amp;from=default">#决战2020#</a>近日，国务院扶贫开发领导小组印发通知，强调要做好新冠肺炎疫情防控期间脱贫攻坚工作，坚决打赢疫情防控阻击战和脱贫攻坚战。要坚定信心决心，坚持如期全面完成脱贫攻坚任务不动摇，工作总体安排部署不能变，决不能有缓一缓 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu2a5dPD4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471581533296730:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471581533296730&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6589225127&amp;cid=4471586042622969&amp;nick=酥到掉渣的草莓味曲奇小饼干&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【再出征！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%86%8D%E6%B4%BE320%E4%BA%BA%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江再派320人医疗队驰援武汉#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>13日，哈尔滨医科大学附属第一医院、哈尔滨医科大学附属第二医院分别派出160名医护人员组成黑龙江省驰援湖北第四批医疗队，共计320人，前往武汉定点医院支援。截至目前，黑龙江省已派出四批共计892人前往湖北驰援。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网黑龙江频道">@人民网黑龙江频道</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu25e6Sxy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471578521639624:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471578521639624&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2812623367" usercard="id=2812623367">北岛哥哥</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve_gold"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：疫情结束后希望年青人树立正确人生导向，把高薪留给一线科研人员，演艺明星是强不了国的。这次疫情，实业界科技界以亿为单位捐赠，演艺界除了韩红， 演艺明星们并末涌跃捐赠，体育明星也没见几个捐款的!。以前成名了捞够的都移民了。国家兴靠教育科技医疗，所以要树立全民崇尚医生，科学家，教师，军人        </div>

        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331405&amp;ssig=iyymYxCJjZ" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471570338686805" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu1S1ArPL?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 18:15" date="1581588909000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471570338686805:fromprofile"> 2月13日 18:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%90%8E%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E8%87%AA%E6%84%88%E5%90%8E%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%94%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#95后护士自愈后重返一线#</a>】还记得那位写下“自愈”日记的24岁护士贾娜吗？2月11日，是贾娜“自愈”后重返岗位的第一天。她坦言，上班时穿着厚重的防护隔离装备，忙到几乎不停歇，下班后累得连打电话的劲都没有了，但内心却充实而满足。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，“我终于回来了，和大家一起并肩作战，直 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu1S1ArPL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471570338686805:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471570338686805&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【干净利落！广西<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2356%E5%B2%81%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%A4%BA%E5%88%80%E5%88%B6%E4%BC%8F%E6%8A%A2%E9%93%B6%E8%A1%8C%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#56岁民警夺刀制伏抢银行男子#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，广西南宁，一男子闯入武鸣区某银行持刀砍伤一女职员实施抢劫。据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%AD%A6%E9%B8%A3%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=武鸣公安">@武鸣公安</a> 通报，警方接警后两分钟内赶到，56岁老民警苏瑞瑾临危不惧，干脆利落夺刀制伏劫匪。受伤银行女职员无生命危险，案件进一步调查中。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=时间视频">@时间视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471567038125919:1034-video:1034%3A4471519884017715:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471567038125919:2286908003" title="时间视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4j2hM" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4j2hM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>时间视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【北京一病例<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%91%E7%97%85%E5%90%8E%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E5%BF%8D%E7%9D%80%E5%85%A8%E5%AE%B67%E4%BA%BA%E9%83%BD%E4%B8%AD%E6%8B%9B%23&amp;from=default">#发病后在家忍着全家7人都中招#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>13日，北京市疫情防控新闻发布会上，北京市疾控中心副主任庞星火介绍北京病例时透露，某家人在过年期间和亲戚聚会几天后，亲戚告知他自己已确诊，仍不当回事，其家人发病仍在家忍着，直到孩子病了才开始着急，最终全家7个人全部中招。 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4471561891467948&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbuwm9p2g3j20ck0ck3z3" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263gy1gbuwm9p2g3j20ck0ck3z3"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu1Ep69SA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471561891467948:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471561891467948&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471556623599476" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu1vUf6o4?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 17:20" date="1581585639000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471556623599476:fromprofile"> 2月13日 17:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E5%90%84%E6%A0%A12%E6%9C%88%E5%BA%95%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#四川各校2月底前不开学#</a>】13日，四川省教育厅发布通知，称根据当前疫情发展形势，四川省各级各类学校（高校、中小学、中职学校、幼儿园、校外培训机构）2020年2月底前暂不开学。具体开学时间将视疫情防控情况，经科学评估后确定，届时提前向社会公布。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF%23&amp;from=default">#各地开学最新消息#</a><a title="权威发布！四川省各级各类学校2月底前暂不开学" href="http://t.cn/A6hb7GI3" alt="http://t.cn/A6hb7GI3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>权威发布！四川省各级各类学校2月底前暂不开学</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471556250168377" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu1vj0HNL?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 17:19" date="1581585549000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471556250168377:fromprofile"> 2月13日 17:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【转发扩散！12日<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%8F%91%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%E8%BF%87%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%9C%BA%E6%89%80%23&amp;from=default">#北京新发病例活动过小区场所#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>，北京市疾病预防控制中心发布2月12日新发病例活动过的小区或场所，具体信息如下↓↓确诊病例已收入定点医院进行救治，小区居民不用担心和焦虑。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网北京频道">@人民网北京频道</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%B1%E9%87%8D%E5%9E%8B%E5%84%BF%E7%AB%A5%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#国内首例危重型儿童患者康复出院#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>因新冠肺炎导致呼吸衰竭，在“鬼门关”走了一遭的1岁男童牛牛（化名），经武汉儿童医院重症医学科全力救治保住性命。2月13日，家人将已确认符合出院标准的牛牛接回家继续隔离观察。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1月26日下午，家住武汉市黄陂区的牛牛间断腹 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu1h0bRfZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471547382826331:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471547382826331&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E15152%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A59804%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国新增15152例累计确诊59804例#</a>】新增确诊病例15152例，其中湖北临床诊断病例13332例，重症病例减少174例，新增死亡病例254例（湖北242例），新增疑似病例2807例，新增治愈病例1171例，解除医学观察的密切接触者29429人。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471539908533377:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471539697909763:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471539908533377:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4duVx" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4duVx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471537865958385" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu11Ep02Z?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 16:06" date="1581581167000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471537865958385:fromprofile"> 2月13日 16:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【钟南山、李兰娟院士团队从新冠肺炎患者粪便中分离出病毒】记者2月13日从科技部获悉，钟南山、李兰娟院士团队近日分别从新冠肺炎患者的粪便样本中分离出新型冠状病毒，这一发现证实了排出的粪便中的确存在活病毒，对于准确认识疾病的治病传播机理，帮助全社会有针对性地做好防控， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu11Ep02Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471537865958385:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471537865958385&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民战“疫”特别直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%83%A1%E9%94%A1%E8%BF%9B%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9B%BE%E5%85%89%23&amp;from=default">#胡锡进对话曾光#</a>】2月13日16:00，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网">@人民网</a>《人民战“疫”》推出特别节目，环球时报总编辑胡锡进对话中国疾控中心流行病学首席科学家曾光，解读返工大潮下疫情防控要点和疫情的发展趋势。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，敬请关注↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471536485958407:1034-video:1034%3A4474124261588995:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471536485958407:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4BZqh" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4BZqh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4471532472137802" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu0SX8Y8G?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 15:44" date="1581579881000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471532472137802:fromprofile"> 2月13日 15:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【2月7日起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%AF%8F%E5%A4%A9%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E8%BE%BE500%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&amp;from=default">#全国每天治愈出院达500以上#</a> 平均住院日10天】国家卫生健康委医政医管局监察专员郭燕红：2月7日起全国每天治愈出院达500以上，所有病例平均住院日10天左右。并组织专家对治愈出院病人当中的597例，进行初步分析。其中治愈出院病人当中90%是轻型和普通型，10%属于诊疗当中的重症和危重症。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu0SX8Y8G" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471532472137802:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471532472137802&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471530543363477" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu0PQe6ZD?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 15:37" date="1581579421000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471530543363477:fromprofile"> 2月13日 15:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E6%97%A5%E4%BA%A7%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B315.8%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%AA%23&amp;from=default">#湖北口罩日产增至15.8万只#</a>】国家发展改革委产业发展司一级巡视员夏农表示，迅速组织企业恢复生产，保障口罩全产业链协调运营。2月2日以来，我国口罩产量逐日提升，截至2月11日，全国口罩产能利用率达94%，医用N95产能利用率达128%。湖北口罩日产从2日的4.5万只，增长到11日的15.8万只。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu0PQe6ZD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471530543363477:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471530543363477&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%B8%BB%E8%A6%81%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E9%80%94%E5%BE%84%E5%B0%9A%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%98%E5%8C%96%23&amp;from=default">#病毒主要传播途径尚未变化#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋表示，发热、乏力、干咳仍然是最主要的临床表现，粪便中分离到病毒并不意味主要传播途径发生变化。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471525937277090:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471525827346455:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471525937277090:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4QRPs" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4QRPs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471524809169962" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu0GACtwC?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 15:14" date="1581578054000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471524809169962:fromprofile"> 2月13日 15:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【关于门诊费用，人民日报今天发的这篇“建议”不寻常！】我国职工基本医保的门诊待遇，主要是通过个人账户来保障的。从近年来的情况看，个人账户的门诊待遇保障是不足的，资金使用效率也不高，一些地区也进行了改革探索。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E5%B0%86%E9%97%A8%E8%AF%8A%E8%B4%B9%E7%94%A8%E7%BA%B3%E5%85%A5%E7%BB%9F%E7%AD%B9%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E6%94%AF%E4%BB%98%23&amp;from=default">#建议将门诊费用纳入统筹基金支付#</a>，改革个人账户，不断增强门诊共济保障。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu0GACtwC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471524809169962:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471524809169962&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471523316258656" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iu0Ebqga4?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-13 15:08" date="1581577697000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471523316258656:fromprofile"> 2月13日 15:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E5%86%8D%E5%8A%A0%E6%B4%BE%E4%B8%A4%E6%89%B9%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&amp;from=default">#四川再加派两批医疗队援助湖北#</a>】2月13日，四川将再派200余名医疗队员前往湖北武汉。据悉，这也是四川省第七、八批援助湖北医疗队。据了解，自大年初一至今，赶赴武汉的四川援助湖北医疗队已陆抵达六批，共900多人。此次，第七、第八批前往，整个赴湖北援助的四川医疗队员将超千人。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iu0Ebqga4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471523316258656:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471523316258656&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E6%A3%80%E5%AF%B9%E8%83%A1%E6%80%80%E9%82%A6%E5%86%B3%E5%AE%9A%E9%80%AE%E6%8D%95%23&amp;from=default">#最高检对胡怀邦决定逮捕#</a>】国家开发银行原党委书记、董事长胡怀邦涉嫌受贿一案，由国家监察委员会调查终结，移送检察机关审查起诉。日前，最高人民检察院依法以涉嫌受贿罪对胡怀邦作出逮捕决定。该案正在进一步办理中。 ​​​​<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%A3%80%E5%AF%9F%E9%99%A2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=最高人民检察院">@最高人民检察院</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【直播：国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会】国务院联防联控机制于2月13日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍重要医用物资保障和医疗资源调配保障最新进展情况。敬请关注。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#民民直播#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471521399580888:1034-video:1034%3A4474134126854170:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471521399580888:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4Y7qZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4Y7qZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【正在直播：浙江疫情防控工作新闻发布会】浙江于2月13日15:00召开新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会，敬请关注。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471521278260379:1034-video:1034%3A4474359495196682:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471521278260379:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h4jDEQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4jDEQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E5%BB%B6%E8%BF%9F%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#湖北省继续延迟复工开学#</a>】湖北省疫情防控指挥部通告：继续延迟复工开学，省内各类企业不早于2月20日24时前复工；省内大专院校、中小学、中职学校、技工院校、幼儿园延期开学。具体开学时间，将根据疫情防控情况，经科学评估后确定，并提前向社会公布。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6h4OiuN" alt="http://t.cn/A6h4OiuN" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" action-data="cid=4471529612454435&amp;is_more=1&amp;type=small&amp;ouid=" action-type="commentDialogue">查看对话</a></span></li>
                                                                <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <li>

                                    <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                                </li>

                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%9C%BA%E8%88%9E%E5%A4%A7%E5%A6%88%E8%A2%AB%E8%BF%AB%E6%88%90%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#广场舞大妈被迫成主播#</a>，网络联机云跳广场舞<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】重庆南川，平日里最喜欢热闹的坝坝舞大妈们，是最闲不住的人之一。在这场疫情防控阻击战中，她们虽然宅在家，却用另一种方式发挥着自己的“热能”。一边在网上义务宣传防疫知识，一边通过视频聊天继续跳舞。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%A2%A8%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=梨视频">@梨视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471514106115251:2017607-video:2017607%3A4471229311287322:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471514106115251:2286908003" title="梨重庆的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hyzO0r" alt="http://t.cn/A6hyzO0r" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>梨重庆的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            </ul>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6584635636" usercard="id=6584635636">小周Peppa</a>：作为上海老百姓，不惧怕疫情数字🔢，怕的是像武汉那种欺上瞒下弄虚作假的领导！有外来人员返城是很正常的事，毕竟大家都要生活都要吃饭的，但上海人坚决拒绝任何期瞒❌<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=上海发布">@上海发布</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a>        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                 【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" 【中纪委常委会会议：重点加强对湖北及武汉纪检监察工作指导】中央纪委常委会13日召开会议，会议强调，纪检监察机关要坚决有力监督保障执行，继续紧盯疫情防控责任落实、重点工作和重点环节强化政治监督，督促各级党委、政府落实主体责任，督促卫生健康、交通、市场监管、药监等部门履行行业监管职责。 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" \/>】2月3日，5岁男童熙熙的家人先后被确诊为新冠肺炎，熙熙面临无人照顾的情况。8名护士自发组成“妈妈团”，轮流照顾他的生活起居。2月12日，熙熙的妈妈治愈出院。虽然这份陪伴是临时的，但背后的爱却是最真挚的！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\"         </div>
